Articles.Content:
> 
> [**Release notes are here** !\[:)\](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/content/337-KSP-1-0-1-Is-Up)

Ah, thank you.

> 
> Ehh, where did the drag values go? Also, where can I find a changelog for the hotfix?

Yep, good question, maybe they decided they are useless because not all modules contribute drag but only the front ones and you can see a drag value for the whole ship somewhere?
1.0.1 has been released, so I'm closing this thread ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
